com.rift.coad.lib.security.user
Interface UserStoreConnector

All Superinterfaces:
LoginModule
All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLUserStore
public interface UserStoreConnector
extends LoginModule

This interface supplies the ability to connect to the user data store. This data store could be Database, Text File, XML File, LDAP etc.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getName()
          This method returns the name of the user store.
 UserSession getUserInfo(java.lang.String username)
          This method returns the user information for the given username.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.rift.coad.lib.security.login.LoginModule
getLoginHandler, handleAuthType
 

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
This method returns the name of the user store.

Returns:
The string containing the name of the user store.

getUserInfo

UserSession getUserInfo(java.lang.String username)
                        throws UserException
This method returns the user information for the given username. Note: this method must not throw an exception if the user is not found, it must instead return null.

Parameters:
username - The name of the user to retrieve information for.
Returns:
UserSession The user object for the given username.
Throws:
UserException
